column1: 作词 : 哈哈哈与大脚怪
column27: These fancy things will never come in between
column28: 那些花哨的事情从不会搅乱我们的感情
column29: You're part of my entity， here for infinity
column30: 我们如胶似漆 从咫尺到天涯
column31: When the war has took its part
column33: When the world has dealt its cards
column35: If the hand is hard， together we'll mend your heart
column36: 如果这只手足够强大 强大到能抚平你心中的创伤
column37: You can run into my arms
column39: It's okay， don't be alarmed， come in to me
column40: 没问题的 别紧张 到我这来
column41: There's no distance in between our love
column43: So go on and let the rain pour
column44: 所以去迎接下落的雨滴吧
column45: I'll be all you need and more
column46: 我能给予的比你想要的更多
column47: Because when the sun shines， we'll shine together
column48: 因为阳光席卷之时 我们一同闪耀
column49: Told you I'll be here forever
column51: Said I'll always be your friend
column52: 我说过会永远做你的朋友
column53: Took an oath， I'ma stick it out to the end
column54: 我发誓 我会坚持到底
column55: Now that it's raining more than ever
column57: Know that we'll still have each other
column58: 我知道我们仍拥有彼此
column59: You can stand under my umbrella
column61: You can stand under my umbrella
